Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Medicaid fraud rate in Virginia is 0.47 percent.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or study that quantifies the amount of fraud in Virginia's Medicaid program.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the 0.47 percent figure represents the Medicaid fraud rate, when in fact it is a measurement of payment errors.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the 0.47 percent figure is not an accurate indicator of fraud and is not set up to measure fraud.
